item.title: Report E-2025050192
item.description:
Report E-2025050192

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-26
  • City: BELLE
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PITT OHIO EXPRESS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: As freight was being unloaded at the destination terminal, the drum was punctured by a forklift blade. The drum was immediately placed into an overpack container to prevent further release. The released material was absorbed using absorbent material and set aside for proper disposal. The package specifications were unable to be safely obtained
